About the Company: ECE Industries Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of Transformers, Meters and Elevators.The company`s product range includes Transformers,Meters-Single Phase Static Eneregy Meters,Three Phase Static Energy Meters,Tri-vector Meters,Single Phase Pre-Paid Meters and Energy Audit Meter.Elevators- Manufactures Wide Range of passenger and goods elevators for Residential and Commercial Buildings, Multiplexes, Hospitals and Elevators for industrial usage. The Product Range Includes both manual as well as Automatic Door Elevators with various speeds. Machine Rooms Less Elevators are also available in the product line.
